EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You For Your Interest In Royal Salute
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for attending the Sunday Brunch at Singapore Polo Club. We're delighted to have had the opportunity to share our passion for crafting and blending the most exceptional Scotch whiskies, matured for a minimum of 21 years. Stored in bottles handcrafted from the finest porcelain with the highest attention to detail, we choose only the best whiskies to create our collections.
We look forward to seeing you again at our next tournament.
